pullRequest.title: Add fix to handle tests outside tests directory
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

This PR fixes the following issues.


When there are tests defined outside the tests directory, a Null pointer exception is thrown.
When there is at least one test defined inside the tests directory, tests outside the tests directory are also executed.

Fixes #20359
Approach

This fix avoids adding a test suite to the package if there are no tests inside the tests directory. Thus, only tests defined inside the tests directory of a module are executed when using the command 'ballerina test <module_name>'
